kpi.activeAssetsTooltip: Number of digital assets currently active on the ledger
kpi.totalAssetsTooltip: Total number of digital assets created (active + inactive)
kpi.totalIssuancesTooltip: Lifetime count of all asset issuance transactions
kpi.pendingIssuancesTooltip: Number of asset issuances waiting for ledger validation
kpi.totalAuthorizationsTooltip: Total number of authorization records created
